item.title: Welcome to Blog
item.description: Okay, first real post. Here we go. Like a whole ton of people, I’ve thought about starting to blog several times over the years. I’ve journaled in a physical notebook on and off forever, and have pretty consistently kept a bullet journal for a combination of task and habit tracking, capturing ideas, and shortlength journaling. I’ve also written privately in longer form digital documents, which I do find helpful. I think having something be publicly available might force me to A) write more concisely and B) write more often(?
